sql.query: select glp_orgname1, glp_orgname2, glp_orgname3, glp_orgname4, glp_orgname5 from globaloptions

select NPPD_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || NPPD_LAST_NAME || ' ' || NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as np_name,to_char(NPPD_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPPD_DOB, '' as driving,'' as adhar,NPPD_PAN_NO,NPPD_VOTER_NO from NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS where NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

SELECT NPAAPD_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || NPAAPD_LAST_NAME || ' ' || NPAAPD_MIDDLE_NAME as np_name,NPAAPD_PAN as NP_PAN,to_date(NPAAPD_DATE_OF_BIRTH,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPPD_DOB,'' as NP_DRIVING,'' as NP_ADHAR,'' as NP_VOTE FROM NP_AGRI_APPL_PERS_DETAILS where NPAAPD_APP_REF_ID='^'

SELECT NPLPD_LHPD_F_NAME || ' ' || NPLPD_LHPD_L_NAME || ' ' || NPLPD_LHPD_M_NAME as np_name,NPLPD_LHPD_PAN as NP_PAN,to_char(NPLPD_DATE_OF_BIRTH,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPPD_DOB,'' as NP_DRIVING,'' as NP_ADHAR,'' as NP_VOTE FROM NP_LH_PERSONAL_DET where NPLPD_APP_REF_ID='^'

select NPCD_FNAME || ' ' || NPCD_LNAME || ' ' || NPCD_MNAME as np_name,to_char(NPCD_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPCD_DOB, NPCD_DRIVING_LIC as driving, '' as adhar,'' as NPPD_PAN_NO,'' as NPPD_VOTER_NO from NP_COAPP_DETAIL where NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^' order by NPCD_COAPP_ID
select PERAPP_ID,to_char(PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_FNAME || ' ' || PERAPP_LNAME as name from perapplicant where ^
select * from NP_DEDUPECHECK where NP_REFNO ='^' and upper(NP_APPLICANTNAME) = upper('^')
update NP_DEDUPECHECK set NP_ISDEDUPE=?,NP_ISNEW=?,NP_CBSID=?,NP_LAPSID=? where NP_REFNO=? and NP_APPLICANTNAME=?
insert into NP_DEDUPECHECK(NP_REFNO,NP_APPLICANTNAME,NP_LAPSID,NP_ISNEW,NP_ISDEDUPE,NP_CBSID,NP_APPTYPE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into NP_DEDUPECHECK(NP_REFNO,NP_APPLICANTNAME,NP_LAPSID,NP_ISDEDUPE,NP_CBSID,NP_APPTYPE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from NP_DEDUPECHECK where NP_REFNO=? and upper(NP_APPLICANTNAME) = upper(?)
select PERAPP_ID,to_char(PERAPP_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as PERAPP_DOB,PERAPP_AADHAAR,PERAPP_PANNO,PERAPP_CBSID,PERAPP_FNAME || ' ' || PERAPP_LNAME as name from perapplicant where ^ order by perapp_id desc

select NPDT_SCHEMENAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_SCHEMEID, NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE, NPDT_SCHEMETYPE, NPDT_CREATEDBY,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME, NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,NPPD_ID,NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_APPNO, NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS ,ORGANISATIONS b where b.org_scode='^' and NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='HL' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE

select NPDT_SCHEMENAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_SCHEMEID, NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE, NPDT_SCHEMETYPE, NPDT_CREATEDBY,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME, NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,NPPD_ID,a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_APPNO, NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS,ORGANISATIONS b where b.org_code like '^%' and NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='EDU' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE

select NPDT_SCHEMENAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_SCHEMEID, NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE, NPDT_SCHEMETYPE, NPDT_CREATEDBY,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME, NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,NPPD_ID,a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_APPNO, NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS,ORGANISATIONS b where b.org_code like '^%'and NPDT_APPHOLDER='^' and NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='EDU' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME ,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.SWMS_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME" ,NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_SWMS_PERSONAL_DET d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.SWMS_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='BS' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME ,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME",NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,a.NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='BS' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME ,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.APDP_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME",NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_STD_APPLICANT_PAN_DET_PROXY d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.APDP_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='BS' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME ,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.MPDP_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME",NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_MUDRA_PARTNER_DET_PROXY d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.MPDP_APPLN_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='BS' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union
SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME ,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME",NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER, a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,a.NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='LHD' and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME not in('NRLM','NULM') and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NRLMPD_MIS_BRANCH_CODE as "APPLICANTNAME" ,NPDT_APPHOLDER,NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_NRLM_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_scode LIKE '^%' and d.NRLMPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='LHD' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME not in('SRMS') and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL --ORDER BY NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID
union all
SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME" ,NPDT_APPHOLDER,NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_scode LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='LHD' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME not in('SRMS') and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL --ORDER BY NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID
union all
SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPLPD_LHPD_F_NAME as "APPLICANTNAME" ,NPDT_APPHOLDER,NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_LH_PERSONAL_DET d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPLPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='LHD' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME not in('SRMS') and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL --ORDER BY NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID, a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPAAPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPAAPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPAAPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPAAPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPAAPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME" ,a.NPDT_APPHOLDER,a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_AGRI_APPL_PERS_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPAAPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='AGRI' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL
union all
SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID, a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME" ,a.NPDT_APPHOLDER,a.NPDT_INWARDNO,a.NPDT_INWSTATUS,a.NPDT_APPNO FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='AGRI' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL

select NPDT_SCHEMENAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_SCHEMEID, NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE, NPDT_SCHEMETYPE, NPDT_CREATEDBY ,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS, NPDT_MODIFIEDBY, NPDT_MODIFIEDDATETIME, NPDT_TRANSACTIONID, NPDT_IFSCCODE, NPDT_BRNCODE, NPDT_ORGCODE, NPDT_APPHOLDER,NPDT_APPNO, NPPD_SALUTATION ||' '|| NPPD_FIRST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_LAST_NAME ||' '|| NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME as APPLICANTNAME,NPPD_ID,NPDT_INWARDNO,NPDT_INWSTATUS,NPDT_APPNO from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b,NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d where a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_scode LIKE '^%' AND a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and NPDT_APPHOLDER='^' and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NPDT_APPHOLDER=? where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?

SELECT NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPPD_FIRST_NAME,NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME,NPPD_LAST_NAME,NPPD_GENDER,to_char(NPPD_DOB,'dd/mm/yyyy') as NPPD_DOB, NPPD_EMAIL,NPPD_MOBILE_NUMBER,NPPD_EMP_TYPE_ID,NPPD_GENDER_ID,NPPD_EDU_QUAL_ID, NPPD_OCCUPATION,NPPD_EMP_TYPE,NPPD_VOTER_NO,NPPD_ORG_NAME,NPPD_DESIGNATION,NPPD_WORKING_SINCE_YEAR,NPPD_WORKING_SINCE_MONTH, NPPD_RETIRE_AGE, NPPD_BUSS_ESTA_YEAR, NPPD_BUSS_ESTA_MONTH, NPPD_CURR_BUSS_YEAR,NPPD_ID,NPPD_APPID,NPPD_SOCIAL_CATEGORY,NPPD_FATHERS_NAME ,NPPD_MOTHERS_NAME,NPPD_SALUTATION,NPPD_MARITAL_STATUS,NPPD_PAN_NO,NPPD_EDU_QUALIFICATION,NPPD_RESITANT_STATUS,NPPD_LAPSAPPID, NPPD_CURR_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_OFFICE_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_AADHAR_ADD_SEQ_NO FROM NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS WHERE NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

INSERT INTO APPINWARDREG( INWARD_NO,INWARD_NPREFID,INWARD_CUSTNAME,INWARD_GENDER,INWARD_DOB,INWARD_EMAIL,INWARD_MOBILE,INWARD_EMPLOYMENT,INWARD_VOTERID,INWARD_PANTAN, INWARD_ADD1,INWARD_ADD2,INWARD_DIST,INWARD_STATE,INWARD_CITY,INWARD_COUNTRY,INWARD_ZIPCODE,INWARD_TERMLOANAMT,INWARD_TENOR,INWARD_SECTOR,INWARD_CREATEDON, INWARD_APPLIEDON,INWARD_BORROWERTYPE,INWARD_SCHEME,INWARD_APPLNPROCESSAT,INWARD_ORGSCODE,INWARD_USRID,INWARD_VALUESIN, INWARD_MODIFIEDBY,INWARD_MODIFIEDDATE,INWARD_APPLIEDFOR,INWARD_PROPTYPE,INWARD_CIBILREPORT,INWARD_COAPP,INWARD_APPLISENTTO, INWARD_PRDCODE,INWARD_APPTYPE,INWARD_CREATEDBRANCH,INWARD_ORGINATEBRANCH,INWARD_SUMOF_VALUE,INWARD_BANKNAME,INWARD_DOCRECEIVED,INWARD_SUBSIDYAMT,INWARD_SCHEMEDESC,INWARD_BANKSCHEME,INWARD_APPSTATUS,INWARD_CBSCUSTID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,SYSDATE,'N','',?,?,?,'A',?,SYSDATE,'N','C','1',?,?,?,'a',?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
SELECT NPCL_LOVVAL FROM NP_COMMONLOV WHERE NPCL_SCHEMETYPE='^' AND NPCL_SEGMENT='^' AND NPCL_COLDESC='^'
insert into com_demographics(demo_appno, demo_comappid, demo_industrycode, demo_indrating, demo_finstandard, demo_apptype, demo_finmodel,demo_comappnewid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO COM_ASSESSMENT_COSTOFPROJ (COM_COST_APPNO,COM_COST_DETAILS) VALUES(?,?)
select NPLOV_LPCODE from NP_LISTOFVALUES where NPLOV_LOVHEADID='^' and NPLOV_LPDESC='^'

SELECT NPAA_STREET_NAME,NPAA_LAND_MARK,NPAA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPAA_SUB_DISTRICT,NPAA_VILLAGE,NPAA_STATE_NAME,NPAA_DISTRICT_NAME, NPAA_CITY_NAME,NPAA_PIN_CODE FROM NPPD_AADHAR_ADDRESS WHERE NPAA_APP_REF_ID='^' AND NPAA_COAPPREF_ID='^'

select NPAD_STREET_NAME,NPAD_LANDMARK,NPAD_COUNTRY_NAME,NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT,NPAD_VILLAGE,NPAD_STATE_NAME,NPAD_DISTRICT_NAME, NPAD_CITY_NAME,NPAD_PIN_CODE,NPAD_STATE_CODE,NPAD_CITY_ID,NPAD_VILLAGE_CODE,NPAD_DISTRICT_CODE,NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT_CODE from NP_ADDRESS_DETAILS where NPAD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^' and NPAD_ADD_SEQ_NO='^'

SELECT NPID_ROWID, NPID_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPID_LOAN_AMT, NPID_SUBSIDY_AMT, NPID_EMI, NPID_ROI, NPID_TENOR, NPID_BRANCH_NAME, NPID_BRANCH_CODE, NPID_IFSC_CODE, NPID_ADDRESS, NPID_CONTACT_NUM, NPID_PROCESS_FEE, NPID_JOURNEY_CMPLT_DT, NPID_CREATED_BY, NPID_CREATED_DT, NPID_MODIFIED_BY, NPID_MODIFIED_DT, NPID_SEQNO FROM NP_INPRINCIPLE_DETAILS WHERE NPID_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

SELECT b.org_name as BRANCH, b.SOLID as branchsolid,APP_STATUS, r.org_name as REGION,r.SOLID as regionsolid, f.org_name as FGMO,f.SOLID as fgmosolid,CUST_ACCOUNTOPENDATE, APP_NPREFID, a.APP_NO,APP_CBSACCOUNT_NO, to_char(APP_CREATEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CREATEDATE,NPSCH_SCHEMENAME,case APP_STATUS when 'op' then 'Open/Pending' when 'pa' then 'Processed/Approved' when 'ol' then 'Open/Lodged' when 'pr' then 'Processed/Rejected' when 'ca' then 'Closed/Approved' when 'cr' then 'Closed/Rejected' when 'h' then 'Hold' else '' end as appstatus, to_char(app_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_processdate FROM APPLICATIONS a left outer join CUST_SEND_TO_CBS on CUST_APPNO=a.APP_NO left outer join organisations b on b.ORG_CODE=rpad(substr(APP_ORGCODE,0,12),15,0) left outer join organisations r on r.org_code=rpad(substr(APP_ORGCODE,0,9),15,0) left outer join organisations f on f.org_code=rpad(substr(APP_ORGCODE,0,6),15,0) left outer join organisations orgs on a.APP_ORGCODE=orgs.ORG_CODE left outer join NP_SCHEMEDETAILS p on a.APP_PRDCODE=p.NPSCH_PRODID WHERE ^ and p.NPSCH_SEGMENT='^' AND p.NPSCH_SCHEMEID='^' and APP_NPREFID is not null
select MAIL_COMMENTS from MAILBOX_HOLDCOMMENTS where MAIL_APPNO='^'
select ar.APP_NO, rr.REJ_DESC from app_reject_reasons ar,reject_reasons rr where ar.APP_NO='^' and ar.REJ_CODE=rr.REJ_CODE

select ap.app_no as appno,ap.app_status as status,pa.perapp_title ||chr(32)|| pa.perapp_fname ||chr(32)|| pa.perapp_mname ||chr(32)|| pa.perapp_lname as aname,d.demo_appid as appid, p.prd_rng_from as rfrom, p.prd_rng_to as rangeto,p.prd_code as prdcode,p.prd_name as proddesc,p.prd_loantype as prdloantype, l.loan_modintrate as mintrate,l.loan_terms as lterms, l.loan_amtreqd as amtreqd,l.loan_costloanprd as cloanprd, l.loan_recmdamt as sancamount,l.loan_downpay as downpay, l.loan_tradein as tradein,l.loan_loantrade as loantrade, par.prd_maxintclass as hidclass, l.loan_reqterms as lreqterms,l.loan_termrange as loan_termrange ,l.loan_inttype as loan_inttype ,loan_purposeofloan as loan_purposeofloan, l.loan_recmdamt as proposedamt, to_char(l.loan_filedon,'DD/MM/YYYY') as loan_filedon ,loan_repaymenttype,loan_appamt as raamount,p.prd_renew,to_char(loan_emidate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as emidate,loan_sanctionrefno, l.loan_marginpercent as loan_marginpercent,l.loan_marginamount as loan_marginamount, l.loan_procfee as lapsprocfee , l.loan_selecttype as loan_selecttype,l.loan_selectpurpose as loan_selectpurpose,l.loan_emi ,ap.APP_INWARDNO as INWARD_NO,l.loan_variance as loan_variance,l.LOAN_PRD_VARIANCE,l.loan_remarks as loan_remarks,loan_sourceincome,l.loan_br,l.loan_house,l.loan_firstbank,l.loan_secondbank, l.loan_noofinstall,l.loan_Stampduty,l.loan_Documentationcharges,l.loan_Registrationcharges,l.loan_pmay, l.loan_schedutype,l.LOAN_DATEBASIS, to_char(l.LOAN_DATEOFFER,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_DATEOFFER,to_char(l.LOAN_DATEAGREEMENT,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_DATEAGREEMENT,l.LOAN_RATECHATCODE, l.LOAN_ACCOUNTVARIANCE, l.LOAN_MORTFLAG,l.LOAN_PSB59,l.LOAN_PSB59_REFNO,l.LOAN_SANCTION_AUTHORITY,l.LOAN_PRD_VARIANCE,l.LOAN_STAFF_PRINCIPAL, l.LOAN_STAFF_INTEREST,l.LOAN_DRAWDOWN,l.LOAN_DRAWDOWN_ACCNO,l.LOAN_DRAWDOWN_CUSTNAME,l.NP_LOAN_REPAYINTEREST,l.NP_LOAN_PRO_REPAYBY, l.NP_LOAN_REPAY_TENURE,l.NP_LOAN_REPAY_AMOUNT,l.NP_LOAN_Subsidy_AMOUNT from perapplicant pa, products p,loandetails l,applications ap,per_demographics d, prdint_master pri,prd_authority par where l.loan_appno=ap.app_no and d.demo_appno=ap.app_no and ap.app_no='^' and p.prd_code=(select a2.app_prdcode from applications a2 where a2.app_no=ap.app_no)and par.prd_code=p.prd_code and pri.PRDINT_PRDCODE=par.PRD_CODE and d.demo_type='a'and pa.perapp_id = d.demo_appid

insert into edu_student (edu_appno,edu_name,edu_relation,edu_relname,edu_relgaurdian,edu_dob,edu_age,edu_caste,edu_religion,edu_status,edu_child,edu_addr1,edu_addr2,edu_city,edu_state,edu_pincode,edu_parentname,edu_stabilityparents,edu_priorexp)values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select perapp_fname||' '||perapp_mname||' '||perapp_lname as perapp_studentname,perapp_fatname,perapp_dob as perapp_dobirth,round((sysdate-to_date(perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy'))/365) as perapp_age,perapp_category,perapp_marstat,perapp_address1,perapp_address2,perapp_city,perapp_state,perapp_zip,nvl(perapp_childnum ,0) as perapp_childnumfrom perapplicant a join per_demographics d on a.perapp_id=d.demo_appid and d.demo_appid ='^' and d.DEMO_APPNO='^'

select peremp_id,peremp_name,peremp_address1,peremp_address2,peremp_city,peremp_state,peremp_zip,peremp_phone,peremp_fax,peremp_email,peremp_empdesig,peremp_contperson,peremp_yresemp,peremp_applnt,peremp_retage,peremp_department,peremp_empid,peremp_compservice,peremp_selContract,peremp_joindate,PEREMP_TRANSFERABLE,PEREMP_EXPFAMMEM from peremployer where peremp_id='^'

select app_prdcode,APP_SR_FLAG,APP_SR_DONE , APP_SR_CONF,APP_SR_ELIG,APP_STATUS,appholder,APP_HEVPLOANTYPE,to_char(APP_DOCUMENT,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APP_DOCUMENT,APP_DOCTIMETYPE,APP_CPCSENTCHK,APP_SANCTIONPRINTFLAG,to_char(app_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_CREATEDATE,to_char(APP_PROCESSDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as APP_PROCESSDATE,APP_REJ_REASON,APP_REJ_OTHERREMAEKfrom applications where app_no = '^'

select edu_appno,edu_name,edu_relation,edu_relname,edu_relgaurdian,to_char(edu_dob,'DD/MM/YYYY') as edu_dob,edu_age,edu_caste,edu_religion,edu_status,edu_child,edu_addr1,edu_addr2,edu_city,edu_state,edu_pincode,edu_parentname,edu_stabilityparents,edu_priorexp,EDU_ELIGINT_SUBSIDY,EDU_PARENTS_INCYEAR,EDU_PARENTS_INCAMT,EDU_INCERTIFICATE_ISSUEDBY,EDU_INCERTIFICATE_NUMBER from edu_student where edu_appno='^'

select NPPD_ID ,NPPD_FIRST_NAME, NPPD_LAST_NAME,NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME,NPPD_MOBILE_NUMBER,NPPD_EMAIL,NPPD_DESIGNATION, NPPD_CURR_BUSS_YEAR,NPPD_RETIRE_AGE,NPPD_ORG_NAME,NPPD_CURR_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_OFFICE_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_AADHAR_ADD_SEQ_NO from NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS where NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

select NPPD_ROW_ID,NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPPD_BUSS_ESTA_MONTH,NPPD_BUSS_ESTA_YEAR,NPPD_CURR_BUSS_YEAR,to_char(NPPD_DOB,'YYYY-MM-DD') as NPPD_DOB,NPPD_DESIGNATION,NPPD_EDU_QUALIFICATION,NPPD_EMAIL, NPPD_EMP_TYPE,NPPD_FATHERS_NAME,NPPD_FIRST_NAME,NPPD_GENDER,NPPD_GROSS_MONTHLY_INCOME, NPPD_IS_CHAIRMAN,NPPD_LAST_NAME,NPPD_MARITAL_STATUS,NPPD_MARKS,NPPD_MIDDLE_NAME,NPPD_MOBILE_NUMBER,NPPD_MOTHERS_NAME,NPPD_OCCUPATION,NPPD_ORG_NAME, NPPD_ORG_TYPE,NPPD_RELATIONSHIP,NPPD_RESITANT_STATUS,NPPD_RETIRE_AGE,NPPD_SALUTATION,NPPD_SOCIAL_CATEGORY,NPPD_WORKING_SINCE_MONTH, NPPD_WORKING_SINCE_YEAR,NPPD_VOTER_NO,NPPD_PAN_NO,NPPD_IS_CURR_ADD_SAME,NPPD_CURR_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_OFFICE_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPD_AADHAR_ADD_SEQ_NO FROM NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS WHERE NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

SELECT NPAA_ROW_ID,NPAA_CITY_NAME,NPAA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPAA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPAA_LAND_MARK,NPAA_PIN_CODE,NPAA_STATE_NAME,NPAA_STREET_NAME,NPAA_SUB_DISTRICT, NPAA_VILLAGE FROM NPPD_AADHAR_ADDRESS WHERE NPAA_APP_REF_ID='^'

SELECT NPCA_ROW_ID,NPCA_CITY_NAME,NPCA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPCA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPCA_LAND_MARK,NPCA_PIN_CODE,NPCA_STATE_NAME,NPCA_STREET_NAME,NPCA_SUB_DISTRICT, NPCA_VILLAGE,NPCA_COAPP_ID FROM NPPD_CURRENT_ADDRESS WHERE NPCA_APP_REF_ID='^'

SELECT NPOA_ROW_ID,NPOA_CITY_NAME,NPOA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPOA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPOA_LANDMARK,NPOA_PIN_CODE,NPOA_STATE_NAME,NPOA_STREET_NAME,NPOA_SUB_DISTRICT, NPOA_VILLAGE FROM NPPD_OFFICE_ADDRESS WHERE NPOA_APP_REF_ID='^'

select NPCD_FNAME,NPCD_MNAME,NPCD_LNAME,NPCD_MOBILE,NPCD_EMAIL,NPCD_DRIVING_LIC,NPCD_AADHAR_NAME,NPCD_FATORHUSB_NAME,NPCD_MOTHER_NAME,NPCD_COMPANY_NAME, NPCD_AADHAR_ADDR_ID,NPCD_CUR_ADDR_ID,NPCD_OFC_ADDR_ID,NPCD_RELATION_WITH,NPCD_SALUTATION,NPCD_GENDER,NPCD_DOB,NPCD_SOCIAL_CAT,NPCD_MARITAL_STAT,NPCD_NOOF_CHILD, NPCD_NOOF_DEPENDENT,NPCD_EDU_QUALIFY,NPCD_RESI_TYPE,NPCD_RESI_SINCE,NPCD_RESI_SINCE_MON,NPCD_IS_CUR_ADDR,NPCD_EMPLOY_TYPE,NPCD_ORG_NAME,NPCD_DESIGNATION, NPCD_WORK_WITH,NPCD_WORK_SINCE,NPCD_WORK_SINCE_MON,NPCD_RETIRE_AGE,NPCD_BUSI_EST_YR,NPCD_YRS_CUR_BUSI,NPCD_MON_INCOME,NPCD_ISGUARANTOR,NPCD_DOR,NPCD_BUSI_EST_MON, NPCD_CUR_BUSI_MON,NPCD_RESI_STAT,NPCD_INCOME_CONSIDER,NPCD_IS_AADHAR_DOB,NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPCD_CREATED_BY,NPCD_CREATED_DT,NPCD_MODIFIED_BY, NPCD_MODIFIED_DT,NPCD_COAPP_REF_ID,NPCD_ROW_ID,NPCD_COAPP_ID from NP_COAPP_DETAIL where NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'
select LAPS_CBSID, CUST_NAME , APPLICANT_TYPE,NP_APP_REFID,SNO,LAPS_APPID,SNO from NP_CUST_DETAILS whereNP_APP_REFID = '^' and LAPS_CBSID='^'

SELECT NPAD_ID, NPAD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPAD_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPAD_ADD_TYPE, NPAD_STREET_NAME, NPAD_LANDMARK, NPAD_COUNTRY_NAME, NPAD_STATE_NAME, NPAD_DISTRICT_NAME, NPAD_CITY_NAME, NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT, NPAD_VILLAGE, NPAD_PIN_CODE, NPAD_STATE_CODE, NPAD_DISTRICT_CODE, NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT_CODE, NPAD_VILLAGE_CODE, NPAD_BLOCK_CODE, NPAD_BLOCK FROM NP_ADDRESS_DETAILS WHERE NPAD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^' AND NPAD_ADD_SEQ_NO = '^'

SELECT NPAD_ID, NPAD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPAD_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPAD_ADD_TYPE, NPAD_STREET_NAME, NPAD_LANDMARK, NPAD_COUNTRY_NAME, NPAD_STATE_NAME, NPAD_DISTRICT_NAME, NPAD_CITY_NAME, NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT, NPAD_VILLAGE, NPAD_PIN_CODE, NPAD_STATE_CODE, NPAD_DISTRICT_CODE, NPAD_SUB_DISTRICT_CODE, NPAD_VILLAGE_CODE, NPAD_BLOCK_CODE, NPAD_BLOCK FROM NP_ADDRESS_DETAILS WHERE NPAD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^'

SELECT NPPRD_ID,NPPRD_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPPRD_SEL_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPPRD_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPPRD_PURPOSEOFLOANID, NPPRD_PURPOSEOFLOAN, NPPRD_SELLERNAME, NPPRD_TYPEOFPROPERTYID, NPPRD_TYPEOFPROPERTY,NPPRD_TYPEOFAREAID, NPPRD_TYPEOFAREA, NPPRD_AREAOFPROPERTY, NPPRD_AGEOFPROPERTY, NPPRD_COSTOFPROPERTY, NPPRD_REGISTRATIONFEE, NPPRD_STAMPDUTY,NPPRD_LOANAMOUNTREQUIRED, NPPRD_APPLICANTCONTRIBUTION, NPPRD_OTHERCOST, NPPRD_REPAYMENTMODEID, NPPRD_REPAYMENTMODE,NPPRD_TENURE FROM NP_APPLICANT_PROPERTY_DETAILS WHERE NPPRD_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'

SELECT BDL_ROW_ID, BDL_SEQUENCENUMBER, BDL_APPCOAPPREFID, BDL_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, BDL_HAVEBANKACCOUNT, BDL_BANKDETAILSTYPE, BDL_ACCOUNTHOLDERNAME, BDL_ACCOUNTSINCE, BDL_BANKACCOUNTNUMBER, BDL_CONFIRMBANKACCOUNTNUMBER, BDL_IFSCCODE, BDL_TYPE, BDL_COAPPLICANTID, BDL_COAPPLICANTID_AGRLOAN FROM NP_BANKDETAILSLIST WHERE BDL_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'

SELECT BSL_ROW_ID, BSL_APPCOAPPREFID, BSL_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, BSL_YEAR, BSL_MONTH, BSL_BANK, BSL_TYPE, BSL_COAPPLICANTID, BSL_COAPPLICANTID_AGRLOAN FROM NP_BANKSTATEMENTLIST WHERE BSL_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'

SELECT CI_ID, CI_BSLSEQUENCENUMBER, CI_APPLICATIONID, CI_NAME, CI_ADDRESS, CI_LANDIINE, CI_MOBILE, CI_EMAIL, CI_PAN, CI_BANK, CI_INSTID, CI_CHKBOUNCEFRLASTSIXMON, CI_CHKBOUNCEFRLASTONEMON, CI_TOTCREDIT, CI_BANKSTATEMENT, CI_PERFIOSTRANID, CI_CUSTOMERTRANID,CI_APPREFID FROM NP_BD_CUSTOMERINFORMATION WHERE CI_APPREFID = '^'

SELECT SI_ID, SI_BSLSEQUENCENUMBER, SI_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, SI_INSTNAME, SI_ACCNO, SI_ACCTYPE, SI_FULLMONTHCOUNT, SI_BALMAX, SI_BALMIN, SI_CASHDEPOSITE,SI_CASHWITHDRAW, SI_CHQDEPOSITS, SI_CHQISSUE, SI_CHEDITS, SI_DEBITS, SI_INWBOUNCES, SI_OUTWBOUNCES, SI_TOTCASHDEP, SI_TOTCASHWITHDRAW, SI_TOTCHQDEP,SI_TOTCHQISSUE, SI_TOTCREDIT, SI_TOTDEBIT, SI_SUMMARYTYPE FROM NP_BD_SUMMARYINFO WHERE SI_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'

SELECT NP_SCO_DET_ID, NP_SCO_DET_APP_REF_ID, NP_SCO_DET_PARAMETER, NP_SCO_DET_ACTUALRANGE, NP_SCO_DET_ACTUALVALBOR, NP_SCO_DET_SCOREACTUAL, NP_SCO_DET_SCOREOUTOF, NP_SCO_DET_TYPE FROM NP_SCORING_DETAILS WHERE NP_SCO_DET_APP_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NSM_ROW_ID, NSM_APP_REF_ID, NSM_EFFECTIVE_ROI_CALC, NSM_SCORING_MODEL, NSM_PF_BASEON, NSM_TENORE_BASEON, NSM_MARGIN_BASEON, NSM_ROI_BASEON, NSM_INTERPRETATION, NSM_SCALE, NSM_SCORE_RANGE, NSM_MIN_PF, NSM_MAX_PF, NSM_PROCESSING_FEES, NSM_MARGIN, NSM_SPREAD, NSM_EFFECTIVE_ROI, NSM_TENORE,NSM_CO_APP_MIN_SCORE, NSM_APP_MIN_SCORE FROM NP_SCALING_MATRIX WHERE NSM_APP_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NPLPD_ROW_ID, NPLPD_APP_REF_ID, NPLPD_APPID, NPLPD_TRAINED_U_SCH, NPLPD_BENF_CAT, NPLPD_MAN_SCAVEN_ID, NPLPD_TRAINING_DET, NPLPD_OTH_BENF_CAT, NPLPD_GENDER_ID, NPLPD_SAL_ID, NPLPD_SOC_CAT_ID, NPLPD_EDU_QUAL_ID, NPLPD_TRA_U_SCH_ID, NPLPD_RELN_ID, NPLPD_BENF_CAT_ID, NPLPD_LHPD_PAN, NPLPD_LHPD_F_NAME,NPLPD_LHPD_L_NAME, NPLPD_LHPD_M_NAME, NPLPD_LHPD_ENT_NAME, NPLPD_LHPD_ENT_TYPE, NPLPD_MINORITYID, NPLPD_MINORITY, NPLPD_ALT_MOB, NPLPD_IS_HANDICAP,NPLPD_NO_DEPENDANTS, NPLPD_NO_CHILDREN, NPLPD_RESI_YEAR, NPLPD_RESI_MONTH, NPLPD_LT_EXP_YEAR, NPLPD_LT_EXP_MONTH, NPLPD_MARK_ARRANGE, NPLPD_HAS_PMSBY,NPLPD_IS_REG_GOV, NPLPD_IS_SKILL_CERT, NPLPD_OTH_EARNING_MEM, NPLPD_SAVING_BAL, NPLPD_MARK_ARRANGE_ID, NPLPD_IS_SHG_MEM, NPLPD_IS_STREET_VEND,NPLPD_MARITAL_STATUSID, NPLPD_ID, NPLPD_AADHAR_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPLPD_CURR_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPLPD_SALUTION, NPLPD_DOB, to_char(NPLPD_DATE_OF_BIRTH,'DD/MM/YYYY') as NPLPD_DATE_OF_BIRTH,NPLPD_LAPSID, NPLPD_FATHER_NAME,NPLPD_GENDER, NPLPD_MOBILE, NPLPD_EMAIL, NPLPD_EDU_QUAL, NPLPD_RELATION, NPLPD_SOCI_CATE, NPLPD_IS_CURR_ADD_SAME, NPLPD_MARITAL_STATUS FROM NP_LH_PERSONAL_DET WHERE NPLPD_APP_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NPAAPD_ROW_ID, NPAAPD_APP_REF_ID, NPAAPD_ID, NPAAPD_SALUTATION_ID, NPAAPD_SALUTATION, NPAAPD_FIRST_NAME, NPAAPD_MIDDLE_NAME, NPAAPD_LAST_NAME,to_char('','DD/MM/YYYY') as NPAAPD_DATE_OF_BIRTH, NPAAPD_FATHER_OR_HUSBAND_NAME, NPAAPD_MOTHER_NAME, NPAAPD_MOBILE, NPAAPD_EMAIL, NPAAPD_EDU_QUALIFICATION_ID,NPAAPD_EDU_QUALIFICATION, NPAAPD_IS_CURRENT_ADD_SAME, NPAAPD_MARITAL_STATUS_ID, NPAAPD_MARITAL_STATUS, NPAAPD_SOCIAL_CATEGORY_ID, NPAAPD_SOCIAL_CATEGORY, NPAAPD_TOTAL_EXP_YEAR, NPAAPD_RESIDENTIAL_STATUS_ID, NPAAPD_RESIDENTIAL_STATUS, NPAAPD_INSTITUTION,NPAAPD_PAN, NPAAPD_INSTITUTION_NAME, NPAAPD_MARKS_OBTAIN,NPAAPD_TRAINING_NAME, NPAAPD_TRAINING_ID, NPAAPD_TRAINING_DESC, NPAAPD_GENDER_ID, NPAAPD_GENDER, NPAAPD_AADHAR_ADD_SEQ_NO, NPAAPD_INST_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPAAPD_CURR_ADD_SEQ_NO,NPAAPD_LAPSID, NPAAPD_APP_SEQ_ID FROM NP_AGRI_APPL_PERS_DETAILS WHERE NPAAPD_APP_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NPAAPDP_ROW_ID, NPAAPDP_APPL_REF_ID, NPAAPDP_PAN, NPAAPDP_FIRST_NAME, NPAAPDP_MIDDLE_NAME, NPAAPDP_LAST_NAME, NPAAPDP_ENTITY_NAME, NPAAPDP_ENTITY_TYPE,NPAAPDP_APP_SEQ_ID FROM NP_AGRI_APPL_PAN_DET_PROXY WHERE NPAAPDP_APPL_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NPD_ROWID, NPD_ID, NPD_APP_REF_ID, NPD_TYPEOFCREDITID, NPD_TYPEOFCREDIT, NPD_TYPEOFACTIVITYID, NPD_TYPEOFACTIVITY, NPD_TYPEID, NPD_PURPOSE,NPD_FINANCIALOUTLAY, NPD_SEQNO, NPD_OTHERACTIVITY FROM NP_AGRI_PROJECT_DETAILS WHERE NPD_APP_REF_ID = '^'

SELECT NLD_ROWID, NLD_ID, NLD_APP_REF_ID, NLD_OWNCONTRIBUTION, NLD_REQUIREDLOANAMT, NLD_TENURE, NLD_ELIGIBLESUBSIDY, NLD_LOCATION, NLD_TOTALPROJECTCOST,NLD_LANDOWNERSHIPID, NLD_LANDOWNERSHIP, NLD_NOOFOWNERS, NLD_TYPEOFPROJECTID, NLD_TYPEOFPROJECT, NLD_TYPEOFBUSINESSID, NLD_TYPEOFBUSINESS,NLD_STORAGECAPACITY, NLD_OTHERBUSINESSTYPE, NLD_INVESTPLANT_MACH, NLD_OWNERNAMES, NLD_ANNUALREVENUE, NLD_ISOTHERBEN_SCHEME, NLD_OTHERBEN_SCHEME,NLD_ADDRESS_SEQNO FROM NP_AGRI_LOAN_DETAILS WHERE NLD_APP_REF_ID = '^'
select NPCC_ROWID,NPCC_COURSE_AMOUNT,NPCC_COURSE_TYPE,NPCC_COURSE_YEAR,NPCC_ID FROM NP_COSTOFCOURSE_DET WHERE NPCC_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

select NPCD_ROW_ID,NPCD_APPLICANT_CONTRIBUTION,NPCD_COURSE_DURATION,to_char(NPCD_COURSE_END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') as NPCD_COURSE_END_DATE, NPCD_COURSE_NAME, to_char(NPCD_COURSE_START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') as NPCD_COURSE_START_DATE,NPCD_EMPLOYEMENT_DESC,NPCD_INSIT_LOC,NPCD_INSIT_NAME, NPCD_IS_PART_TIME_EMP, NPCD_PASSPORT_OBTAINED,NPCD_IS_REPAY_INTEREST,NPCD_IS_SCHOLARSHIP_AVAILED,NPCD_IS_SECURITY,NPCD_LOAN_AMT_REQ,NPCD_PASSPORT_NO,NPCD_AMOUNT, NPCD_REPAYMENT_BY,NPCD_TENURE,NPCD_QUOTA_SELE,NPCD_TYPE_OF_COURSE,NPCD_UNIV_NAME FROM NP_COURSE_DETAILS WHERE NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

select NPAA_ID,NPAA_STREET_NAME,NPAA_LAND_MARK,NPAA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPAA_SUB_DISTRICT,NPAA_VILLAGE,NPAA_STATE_NAME, NPAA_CITY_NAME,NPAA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPAA_PIN_CODE, NPAA_ROW_ID,NPAA_CREATED_BY,NPAA_CREATED_ON,NPAA_MODIFIED_BY,NPAA_MODIFIED_ON,NPAA_COAPP_ID, NPAA_APP_REF_ID,NPAA_COAPPREF_ID from NPPD_AADHAR_ADDRESS where NPAA_ID='^' and NPAA_COAPPREF_ID='^'

select NPAA_ID,NPAA_STREET_NAME,NPAA_LAND_MARK,NPAA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPAA_SUB_DISTRICT,NPAA_VILLAGE,NPAA_STATE_NAME, NPAA_CITY_NAME,NPAA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPAA_PIN_CODE, NPAA_ROW_ID,NPAA_CREATED_BY,NPAA_CREATED_ON,NPAA_MODIFIED_BY,NPAA_MODIFIED_ON,NPAA_COAPP_ID, NPAA_APP_REF_ID,NPAA_COAPPREF_ID from NPPD_AADHAR_ADDRESS where NPAA_ID='^'

select NPCA_ID,NPCA_STREET_NAME,NPCA_LAND_MARK,NPCA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPCA_SUB_DISTRICT,NPCA_VILLAGE,NPCA_STATE_NAME,NPCA_CITY_NAME,NPCA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPCA_PIN_CODE, NPCA_ROW_ID,NPCA_CREATED_BY,NPCA_CREATED_ON,NPCA_MODIFIED_BY,NPCA_MODIFIED_ON,NPCA_COAPP_ID,NPCA_APP_REF_ID,NPCA_COAPPREF_ID from NPPD_CURRENT_ADDRESS where NPCA_ID='^' and NPCA_COAPPREF_ID='^'
select LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_MODINTRATE,LOAN_PROCFEE,LOAN_REQTERMS,LOAN_PAPER_DATE,LOAN_EMI from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select URLS from NP_UPDATEAPI_URLS where APINAME='^'
select LOAN_RECMDAMT,LOAN_MODINTRATE,LOAN_PROCFEE,LOAN_REQTERMS, to_char(LOAN_PAPER_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as LOAN_PAPER_DATE,LOAN_EMI from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select NP_SER_MAS_SCHEME_NAME,NP_SER_MAS_API_NAME from NP_SERVICE_MASTER where NP_SER_MAS_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_SER_MAS_API_NAME='updateProposalStatus' and NP_SER_MAS_API_SEQUENCE='1'
select NP_SER_MAS_SCHEME_NAME,NP_SER_MAS_API_NAME from NP_SERVICE_MASTER where NP_SER_MAS_SCHEME_TYPE='^'and NP_SER_MAS_API_NAME='updateDisbursementDetails' and NP_SER_MAS_API_SEQUENCE='3'
select NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID ='^' and NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^'
select NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID ='^'
select NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,NPDT_REMARKS from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID='^' and NP_UPDSTS_FLG='Y' and NP_PROP_STSFLAG is null
update NP_SANCTION_DTLS set SANCFLAG=?,SANC_API_DATE=SYSDATE,USER_APPROVED=? where APPREFID=?
update NP_DISBURSMENT set DISP_UPDATEFLAG=?,DISB_API_DATE=SYSDATE where APPREFID=?

insert into NP_DISB_HISTORY (DISBURSEMENTDATE,TRANSACTIONNO,DISBURSEDAMOUNT,TOTALDISBURSEDAMOUNT,REMARKS,EMI,STATUS, ACCOUNTNUMBER,TENURE, APPNO,SCHEMETYPE,APPREFID,MODETYPE,DISB_API_DATE,RESP_STATUS,USER_ID) values (to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,?)
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NP_UPDSTS_FLG=?,NP_PROP_API_DATE=SYSDATE,NP_PROP_STSFLAG=? where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?
select LOAN_COSTLOANPRD,LOAN_MODINTRATE,LOAN_EMI,LOAN_REQTERMS,to_char(LOAN_FILEDON,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as LOAN_FILEDON,LOAN_PROFEE from LOANDETAILS where LOAN_APPNO='^'
select DISP_UPDATEFLAG from NP_DISBURSMENT where APPREFID ='^'
select SANCFLAG from NP_SANCTION_DTLS where APPREFID='^' and SANCFLAG='Y'

SELECT NPOA_ROW_ID,NPOA_CITY_NAME,NPOA_COUNTRY_NAME,NPOA_DISTRICT_NAME,NPOA_LANDMARK,NPOA_PIN_CODE,NPOA_STATE_NAME,NPOA_STREET_NAME,NPOA_SUB_DISTRICT,NPOA_VILLAGE FROM NPPD_OFFICE_ADDRESS WHERE NPOA_APP_REF_ID='^' AND NPOA_COAPP_REFID='^'

select NPFD_ROW_ID,NPFD_APP_REF_ID,NPFD_CAPITAL_GAIN,NPFD_GROSS_INCOME,NPFD_GROSS_MONTHLY_INCOME,NPFD_HOUSE_PROPERTY,NPFD_IS_MANUALLY_FILLED, NPFD_NET_MONTHLY_INCOME, NPFD_OTHER_SOURCE,NPFD_PGBP,NPFD_SALARY_INCOME,NPFD_TAXABLE_INCOME FROM NP_FINANCIAL_DETAILS WHERE NPFD_APP_REF_ID='^'
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS=? where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?
SELECT NP_APPLICATION_NUMBER FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS WHERE NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'
select NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMETYPE,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NPDT_APPNO='^'
select NPUD_ROW_ID,NPUD_DOCUMENT_NAME,NPUD_TYPE,NPUD_APP_REF_ID FROM NP_UPLOAD_DOC WHERE NPUD_APP_REF_ID='^'
select NPDD_ROW_ID,NPDD_DOCUMENT_NAME,NPDD_APP_REF_ID,NPDD_SEQ_NO from NP_DOC_DETAILS where NPDD_APP_REF_ID='^'

select NPMD_ROW_ID,NPMD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPMD_PARAMETER_NAME,NPMD_FS_VALUE,NPMD_FP_VALUE, NPMD_APPLICANT_TYPE,NPMD_IS_MANDATORY,NPMD_IS_MATCHED FROM NP_MATCHES_DETAILS WHERE NPMD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'
delete from NP_DISBURSMENT where APPREFID=? and SCHEMETYPE=?

select case when k.org_level='R' then ROCODEwhen k.org_level='A' then BranchCODEwhen k.org_level='F' then COCODE else '001' end as orgcode from ( SELECT USR_ID,USR_ORGCODE,SUBSTR(USR_ORGCODE,1,6)AS COCODE , SUBSTR(USR_ORGCODE,1,9)AS ROCODE ,SUBSTR(USR_ORGCODE,1,12)AS BranchCODE,b.org_level FROM users a , organisations b where a.usr_orgcode=b.org_code and usr_id='^') k

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME, NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG, a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as CUST_NAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL ORDER BY NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as CUST_NAME,a.NPDT_ORGCODE as NPDT_ORGCODE FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE andb.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL ORDER BY NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NRLMPD_SHG_NAME as "CUST_NAME",NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_NRLM_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NRLMPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID, NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME" ,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME as NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPLPD_LHPD_F_NAME as "CUST_NAME",NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_LH_PERSONAL_DET d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPLPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID , NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPAAPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME",NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a, ORGANISATIONS b, NP_AGRI_APPL_PERS_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPAAPD_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID , NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME",NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a, ORGANISATIONS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.SWMS_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME" FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_SWMS_PERSONAL_DET d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.SWMS_APP_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.NPPD_FIRST_NAME as "CUST_NAME" FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b,NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL union SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as "NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME",NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID ,NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_NP_SCHEME_NAME, NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS,a.NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG,a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,d.SPD_INPUT_LABOUR_RAW_MAT as "CUST_NAME" FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,ORGANISATIONS b, NP_STD_PERSONAL_MUDRA_DET d WHERE a.NPDT_IFSCCODE=b.ORG_IFSCCODE and b.org_code LIKE '^%' and d.SPD_APPLN_REF_ID=a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID and a.NPDT_NP_SCHEME_TYPE='^' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NP_REALLOCATION_FLAG= 'Y',NP_REALLOCATION_ORGCODE=?,NP_REALLOCATED_USRID=?,NP_REALLOCATED_DATE=sysdate WHERE NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?

insert into NP_DISBURSMENT (SNO,DISBURSEMENTDATE,TRANSACTIONNO,DISBURSEDAMOUNT,MODETYPE,TOTALDISBURSEDAMOUNT, REMARKS,EMI,STATUS,ACCOUNTNUMBER,TENURE, APPNO,SCHEMETYPE,DISP_UPDATEFLAG,DISPSTATUSFLAG,APPREFID) values (?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select count(*) as count from NP_DISBURSMENT where APPREFID='^' and SCHEMETYPE='^'

SELECT NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID,NPDT_SCHEMEID, NPDT_SCHEMENAME,NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS, NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,b.CUST_NAME FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a,NP_CUST_DETAILS b where a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = b.NP_APP_REFID and a.NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED = '08' and b.APPLICANT_TYPE = 'A' and a.NP_ACCEPT_FLAG IS NULL ORDER BY a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID

select SNO, to_char(DISBURSEMENTDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DISBURSEMENTDATE,TRANSACTIONNO,DISBURSEDAMOUNT,TOTALDISBURSEDAMOUNT,REMARKS,EMI,STATUS, ACCOUNTNUMBER,TENURE, APPNO,SCHEMETYPE,DISP_UPDATEFLAG,DISPSTATUSFLAG,APPREFID,MODETYPE from NP_DISBURSMENT where APPREFID='^'

select SNO, to_char(DISBURSEMENTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as DISBURSEMENTDATE,TRANSACTIONNO,DISBURSEDAMOUNT,TOTALDISBURSEDAMOUNT,REMARKS,EMI, STATUS,ACCOUNTNUMBER,TENURE, APPNO,SCHEMETYPE,DISP_UPDATEFLAG,DISPSTATUSFLAG,APPREFID,MODETYPE from NP_DISBURSMENT where APPREFID='^'
select count(*) as count from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NP_REALLOCATION_ORGCODE='^'and NP_REALLOCATION_FLAG='Y' and NP_ACCEPT_FLAG='Y'

SELECT NPID_ROWID,NPID_ADDRESS,NPID_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPID_BRANCH_CODE,NPID_BRANCH_NAME,NPID_CONTACT_NUM,NPID_LOAN_AMT,NPID_EMI,NPID_PROCESS_FEE, NPID_ROI,NPID_TENOR,NPID_IFSC_CODE,NPID_JOURNEY_CMPLT_DT,NPID_SUBSIDY_AMT FROM NP_INPRINCIPLE_DETAILS WHERE NPID_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^'

select b.LAPS_APPID as LAPS_APPID from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a, NP_CUST_DETAILS b where a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID= b.NP_APP_REFID and a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID='^' and b.LAPS_CBSID is null and b.LAPS_APPID is null
select b.LAPS_APPID as LAPS_APPID from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a, NP_CUST_DETAILS b where a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID= b.NP_APP_REFID and a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID='^'
SELECT * FROM PERAPPLICANT WHERE PERAPP_ID = '^' and (upper(PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS)='N' or PERAPP_PROFILESTATUS is null)

select a.NP_ACCEPT_FLAG,b.APPLICANT_TYPE,NPDT_ROWID,NPDT_APPLICATIONCODE,to_char(NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,'DD/MM/YYYY') as NPDT_CREATEDDATETIME,NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID, NPDT_SCHEMEID,NPDT_SCHEMENAME ,b.LAPS_APPID as "LAPS_APPID",b.LAPS_CBSID as "LAPS_CBSID",b.CUST_NAME as "CUST_NAME",c.NPPD_PAN_NO as "NPPD_PAN_NO",c.NPPD_ORG_NAME as "NPPD_ORG_NAME", a.NP_ACCEPT_FLAG as "NP_ACCEPT_FLAG",a.NP_APPLICATION_NUMBER as APPNUMBER,NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED as NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,a. NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS as NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS a, NP_CUST_DETAILS b, NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS c WHEREa.NP_ACCEPT_FLAG = 'Y' and b.APPLICANT_TYPE='A' and b.NP_APP_REFID=c.NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID and a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=b.NP_APP_REFID ORDER BY a.NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set APPID = ? , CBSID = ? , NPDT_APPLICATIONSTATUS = ? where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = ?
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NP_ACCEPT_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE NPDT_ROWID=? AND NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?
SELECT NPDT_LAPS_ACCEPTED,NPDT_REMARKS,NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG FROM NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS WHERE NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID = '^'

insert INTO NP_PROPOSAL_DTLS (REFID,SEGMENTTYPE,SCHEMENAME,APIHITDATE,STATUS) values(?,?,?,SYSDATE,?)

SELECT NPBE_ID, NPBE_ROW_ID, NPBE_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPBE_QUESTION, NPBE_ANSWER FROM NP_BASIC_ELIGIBILITY WHERE NPBE_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^'

SELECT NULM_ROWID,NULM_ADDR_REFID, NULM_ID, NULM_APP_REF_ID, NULM_PURPOSE_OF_LOAN, NULM_LOAN_AMOUNT, NULM_OWN_CONTRIBUTN, NULM_TOTAL_COST, NULM_ULB_NAME, NULM_ULB_CODE,NULM_MICRO_ENTRPRSE_TYPE, NULM_INCOME_SOURCE, NULM_TYPE_OF_EMPLYMNT, NULM_ANNUAL_INCOME, NULM_ANNUAL_EXPENDITURE, NULM_NATURE_OF_ENTRPRISE_ID,NULM_NATURE_OF_ENTRPRISE, NULM_AREA_OF_PREMISE, NULM_MICRO_ENTRPRSE_TYPE_ID, NULM_AREA_OF_PREMISE_ID, NULM_LOAN_TYPE_ID, NULM_LOAN_TYPE FROM NP_NULM_LOANDET_DATA WHERE NULM_APP_REF_ID = '^'
select NPCFD_LENDER_NAME,NPCFD_SANCTIONED_AMT,NPCFD_CURR_BAL from NP_CURR_FINARRANGE_DET where NPCFD_APP_REF_ID ='^'
select NPPD_FIRST_NAME,'A' as A from NP_APPLICANT_PERSONAL_DETAILS where NPPD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^' and NPPD_ID='468'
select NPCD_FNAME,'C' as C from NP_COAPP_DETAIL where NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID='^' and NPCD_COAPP_ID='355'

select NPED_ID, NPED_ROW_ID, NPED_APP_REF_ID, NPED_CREATED_BY, NPED_CREATED_ON, NPED_MODIFIED_BY, NPED_MODIFIED_ON, NPED_INSITITUTE_NAME, NPED_YEAR, NPED_MARKS, NPED_NO_OF_ATTEMPTS, NPED_CLASS_OBTAINED, NPED_SPECIALIZATION, NPED_APPCOREFID, NPED_TRANSACTION_ID, NPED_SCHEDULER_ID, NPED_SERVICE_ROW_ID, NPED_INSTITUTION_ID from NPPD_EDUCATIONAL_DETAILS where NPED_APP_REF_ID='^' order by NPED_ROW_ID

select NPSCL_ROWID, NPSCL_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPSCL_SCHOLARSHIP_FIELD, NPSCL_ID, NPSCL_SCHOLARSHIP_NAME, NPSCL_SCHOLARSHIP_AMOUNT, NPSCL_SEQ_NO, NPSCL_CREATED_BY, NPSCL_CREATED_ON, NPSCL_MODIFIED_BY, NPSCL_MODIFIED_ON from NP_SCHOLARSHIP_DET where NPSCL_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^' order by NPSCL_ROWID
select NPSD_ROWID,NPSD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID,NPSD_SEC_TYPE,NPSD_SEC_AMOUNT,NPSD_SEC_SEQ,NPSD_ID,NPSD_TYPE_ID FROM NP_SECURITYDET where NPSD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^' order by NPSD_ROWID
update NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS set NP_APPLICATION_NUMBER=?,NPDT_AUTHORIZE_FLAG="" where NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID=?
select LAPS_CBSID, CUST_NAME , APPLICANT_TYPE,NP_APP_REFID,SNO,LAPS_APPID from NP_CUST_DETAILS whereNP_APP_REFID = '^' and LAPS_CBSID is null

insert into NP_CUST_DETAILS (NP_APP_REFID,LAPS_CBSID,LAPS_APPID,APPLICANT_TYPE,NP_CUSTMAPFLAG,CUST_NAME) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into NP_CUST_DETAILS (NP_APP_REFID,APPLICANT_TYPE,CUST_NAME) values(?,?,?)
delete from NP_CUST_DETAILS where NP_APP_REFID=?
select NPDT_APPLICATIONREFERENCEID from NP_APPLICATION_DETAILS where NP_APPLICATION_NUMBER='^'
select NPUD_SEQ_NO,NPUD_APP_REF_ID,NPUD_DOCUMENT,NPUD_DOCUMENT_NAME from NP_UPLOAD_DOC where NPUD_APP_REF_ID='^' and NPUD_ROW_ID='^'
select NPDD_SEQ_NO, NPDD_APP_REF_ID,NPDD_DOCUMENT,NPDD_DOCUMENT_NAME from NP_DOC_DETAILS where NPDD_APP_REF_ID='^' and NPDD_ROW_ID='^'

select NPCD_ROW_ID, NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID, NPCD_CREATED_BY, NPCD_CREATED_ON, NPCD_MODIFIED_BY, NPCD_MODIFIED_ON, NPCD_COURSE_ID, NPCD_COURSE_NAME, NPCD_UNIV_ID, NPCD_UNIV_NAME, NPCD_QUOTA_ID, NPCD_QUOTA_SELE, NPCD_INSIT_NAME_ID, NPCD_INSIT_NAME, NPCD_INSIT_LOC_ID, NPCD_INSIT_LOC, NPCD_TYPE_OF_COURSE, NPCD_COURSE_START_DATE, NPCD_COURSE_END_DATE, NPCD_COURSE_DURATION, NPCD_APPLICANT_CONTRIBUTION, NPCD_LOAN_AMT_REQ, NPCD_IS_REPAY_INTEREST, NPCD_IS_SECURITY, NPCD_REPAYMENT_BY, NPCD_PROPOSED_REPAYMENT_BY_ID, NPCD_TENURE, NPCD_AMOUNT, NPCD_PASSPORT_OBTAINED, NPCD_PASSPORT_NO, NPCD_IS_PART_TIME_EMP, NPCD_EMPLOYEMENT_DESC, NPCD_IS_SCHOLARSHIP_AVAILED, NPCD_ID, NPCD_TYPE_ID from NP_COURSE_DETAILS where NPCD_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ID = '^' order by NPCD_ROW_ID
